moments.title: LR45
moments.author: Let Us All Rejoice
moments.snippet: Save us, O Lord our God! And gather us from the nations, to give thanks to your holy name, and make it our glory to praise you.

moments.title: Psalm 146: 6-7, 8-9, 9-10
moments.author: Owen Alstott
moments.snippet: Blessed are the poor in spirit; the kingdom of heaven is theirs!

moments.author: Owen Alstott
moments.snippet: Rejoice and be glad; your reward will be great in heaven.
moments.txt: Rejoice and be glad; your reward will be great in heaven.

moments.title: The Summons
moments.author: KELVINGROVE
moments.snippet: Will you come and follow me If I but call your name? Will you go where you dont know And never be the same? Will you let my love be shown, Will you let my name be known, Will you let my life be grown In you and you in me?

moments.title: LR46
moments.author: Let Us All Rejoice
moments.snippet: Let your face shine on your servant. Save me in your merciful love. O Lord, let me never be put to shame, for I call on you.

moments.title: Beloved, Arise
moments.author: Sarah Hart
moments.snippet: My Love, Do Not Hide From Me; Show Me Your Face. Your Garden Enchants My Heart; Come Open The Gate. Ill Walk You Through Fields Of White Till Sweet Morning Rise; My Shadows Will Take Their Leave Because You Are Mine.

moments.title: All For Love
moments.author: Sarah Hart/Dwight Liles
moments.snippet: We hunger for you God, We thirst to be renewed, We wait in joyful hope, And make our way to you. As we receive, we receive.

moments.title: Go Make a Difference
moments.author: Steve Angrisano / Tom Tomaszek
moments.snippet: Go make a diff'rence. We can make a diff'rence. Go make a diff'rence in the world. Go make a diff'rence. We can make a diff'rence. Go make a diff'rence in the world.

moments.author: Mass of St. Mary Magdalene - Sarah Hart
moments.snippet: Lord, have mercy. Christ have mercy. Lord have mercy

moments.author: Mass of St. Mary Magdalene - Sarah Hart
moments.snippet: Glory to God! Glory to God in the highest, and on earth, peace to people of goodwill.

moments.author: Mass of St. Mary Magdalene - Sarah Hart
moments.snippet: Holy, holy, holy Lord God of hosts. Heaven and earth are full of your glory. Hosanna in the highest. Blessed is he who comes in the moment of the Lord. Hosanna in the highest.

moments.author: Mass of St. Mary Magdalene - Sarah Hart
moments.snippet: When we eat this bread and drink this cup, we proclaim your death, O Lord, until you come again.

moments.author: Mass of St. Mary Magdalene - Sarah Hart
Mass of St. Mary Magdalene - Sarah Hart
moments.snippet: Lamb of God, You take away the sins of the world; have mercy, have mercy on us.
